A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I really enjoyed this film and am really glad I got to see it prior to general audiences ruining it with spoilers and lowering enthusiasm. It was full of unexpected twists and turns\, a roller coaster of emotions if you will. I find myself still processing what I have seen\, days later. A second and likely third viewing will be a must. Enjoy Star Wars The Last Jedi for what it is\, a great film\, in a series of great films.
